ValueSet-IMMZ.D.DE220.title: IMMZ.D.DE220 ValueSet for Type of TBE dose Schema
ValueSet-IMMZ.D.DE220.description: JSON Schema for IMMZ.D.DE220 ValueSet for Type of TBE dose ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
ValueSet-IMMZ.D.DE220.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZ.D.DE220 ValueSet for Type of TBE dose ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZ.D.DE220.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
